archimate:Goal.name: All forms entry used for business-critical data capture should have format, range and domain validation mechanisms that cannot be circumvented,
archimate:Goal.documentation: For any forms designed to capture information of which accurate data quality is business-critical (e.g. geographical XY coordinates), then those entry mechanisms are implemented with built-in, robust data validation, such that values entered conform to a certain format, domain, or range and that those validation mechanisms cannot be circumvented.
